validEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
invalidPassword: Password must contain at least 8 characters, including an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a special character.
nameInvalid: First name must contain only letters, no special characters.
surnameInvalid: Last name must contain only letters, no special characters.
resetPasswordPrompt: Please provide the email address associated with your account to reset your password.
resetPasswordPromptSecond: Please enter your new password and confirm it.
enterCode: Enter the code sent to your email or phone.
emailInUseError: This email is already in use.
ageRequirement: You must be at least 18 years old.
maxAgeExceeded: Please enter a realistic age under 120 years.
termsAcceptance: I've read and accept the terms and conditions
termsIntro: Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before using our platform.
termsUsage: This platform enables users to book appointments with healthcare providers, upload documents, and manage medical records. By using this platform, you agree to abide by these terms.
dataPrivacyContent: We prioritize the confidentiality of your medical records and personal information. All data uploaded and shared through this platform is protected in compliance with relevant privacy laws. You consent to our use of data as outlined in our Privacy Policy.
responsibilitiesContent: Users are responsible for the accuracy of the information provided and agree not to upload any offensive or unlawful content. Users must ensure that their login credentials are kept secure and not shared with others.
limitationsContent: We are not liable for any damages resulting from the use of this platform, including but not limited to missed appointments, data loss, or unauthorized access to user data. Users acknowledge that healthcare providers are independent and responsible for the services they provide.
changesContent: We may update these Terms and Conditions from time to time. Users will be notified of significant changes, and continued use of the platform implies acceptance of the updated terms.
contactContent: If you have any questions regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact our support team.
enterCodeSentToEmail: Enter the code sent to your email
verificationCodeMaxLength: The verification code must be at most 6 characters.
termsAndConditionsPrompt: To open an account with DocLink, you must agree to the terms and conditions.
